This class is part of the "World of Adventure" application.

CommandWord - Enum Class in Unnamed Package
The CommandWord enum represents the valid command words that can be used in the game.

This class is the main class, text based adventure game.

getExit(String) - Method in class Room
Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction".
getExitString() - Method in class Room
Return a description of the room's exits, for example, "Exits : north west".
getLongDescription() - Method in class Room
Return a string describing the room's long description, of the form: You are in the kitchen.
